mdRecord.dcterms:title: A new map of Virginia / by Robt. Morden
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Morden, Robert, approximately 1650-1703 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map ; 13 x 12 cm. on sheet 19 x 13 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Detached from: Geography rectified..., 3rd ed. London, Printed for R. Morden and T. Cockerill, 1688, p. 561-562. [original]

With map on p. 561, followed by text at the bottom, which continues on verso (p. 562); signature Iiii2 and catchword "the" on p. 561; catchword "Henry's" on p. 562. Running title "A Description of Virginia and Mary-Land." [original]
Covers Chesapeake Bay Region of eastern Va. and Md [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Chesapeake Bay Region (Md. and Va.)--Maps--Early works to 1800
Virginia--Maps--Early works to 1800
